Description: Cast number according to CTD/Bottle log sheets
Cast numbers restart at each station i.e. for Station x, Biology Cast 1 = SxC1, Biology Cast 2 = SxC2, Deep Cast 1 =SxC3, Deep Cast 2 = SxC4
Cast numbers carried through the entire NAAMES campaign, never reseting for an individual cruise nor station
Biology, Deep, Shallow (does not fit Biology or Deep cast scheme), Microlayer
Target Depth according to CTD/Bottle log sheets
1st user polynomial sensor, in this case, UVP5

Method: High temperature combustion/oxidation (HTCO).  Reference: Carlson, C. A., D. A. Hansell, N. B. Nelson, D. A. Siegel, W. M. Smethie, S. Khatiwala, M. M. Meyers and E. Halewood 2010. Dissolved organic carbon export and subsequent remineralization in the mesopelagic and bathypelagic realms of the North Atlantic basin. Deep Sea Research II, 57: 1433-1445.

Unit: WOCE Quality Flags (QF): 1 sample taken, 2 acceptable measurement, 3 Questionable measurement, 4 Bad measurement, 5 not reported, 9 no sample drawn

Method: High temperature combustion/oxidation (HTCO). Glass fiber filtrate type GF/F (Whatman). Reference: Carlson, C. A., D. A. Hansell, N. B. Nelson, D. A. Siegel, W. M. Smethie, S. Khatiwala, M. M. Meyers and E. Halewood 2010. Dissolved organic carbon export and subsequent remineralization in the mesopelagic and bathypelagic realms of the North Atlantic basin. Method: 3H Leu uptake.  Reference: Smith DC, Azam F (1992) A simple, economical method for measuring bacterial protein synthesis rates in seawater using 3H-leucine. Mar Microb Food Webs 6: 107-114.

Unit: WOCE Quality Flags (QF): 1 sample taken, 2 acceptable measurement, 3 Questionable measurement, 4 Bad measurement, 5 not reported, 9 no sample drawn

Method: Epifluorescent microscopy & Flow Cytometry. References: Porter KG, Feig YS. (1980). The use of DAPI for identifying and counting aquatic microflora. Limnol Oceanogr 25: 943–948; Halewood, E. R., C. A. Carlson, M. A. Brzezinski, D. C. Reed, and J. Goodman. 2012. Annual cycle of organic matter partitioning and its availability to bacteria across the Santa Barbara Channel continental shelf. Aquat. Micro- biol. Ecol. 67: 189–209. doi: 10.3354/ame01586

Unit: WOCE Quality Flags (QF): 1 sample taken, 2 acceptable measurement, 3 Questionable measurement, 4 Bad measurement, 5 not reported, 9 no sample drawn

Description: Euphotic Zone depth (1% light level or surface irradiance) determined by Morel algorithm on board
